tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Create intersections, unions and complements of VCF files.
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section --collapse "${sec_default.collapse}" ${sec_default.complement} --exclude "${sec_default.exclude}" #set values_sec_default_apply_filters = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.apply_filters_repeat]) --apply-filters "${values_sec_default_apply_filters}" --include "${sec_default.include}" --nfiles "${sec_default.nfiles}" --output "${sec_default.output}" --output-type "${sec_default.select_output_type}" --prefix "${sec_default.prefix}" #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #set values_sec_default_targets = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.targets_repeat]) --targets "${values_sec_default_targets}" --targets-file "${sec_default.targets_file}" #set values_sec_default_write = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.write_repeat]) --write "${values_sec_default_write}"

param.help: output positions present only in the first file but missing in the others
param.label: Complement
param.name: complement

param.help: exclude sites for which the expression is true
param.label: Exclude
param.name: exclude

param.help: include only sites for which the expression is true
param.label: Include
param.name: include

param.help: output positions present in this many (=), this many or more (+), or this many or fewer (-) files
param.label: Nfiles
param.name: nfiles

param.help: if given, subset each of the input files accordingly, see also -w
param.label: Prefix
param.name: prefix

param.help: list of files to write with -p given as 1-based indexes. By default, all files are written
param.label: Write
param.name: write

tool.help: Create intersections, unions and complements of VCF files.
